MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL41 postcode of Blaenau Ffestiniog, affecting properties in Ffestiniog and the surrounding area. This is causing flickering and reduced power to a number of properties. Our engineers are arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:35am 18th February 2021
